projects.name: Imageify
projects.description: Full-stack web application that uses React, Node.js, and Firebase to allow users to login/register, and upload images to a public repository. Also allows users to delete, and update images they created, and search for particular images

projects.name: The Shoppies
projects.description: React web application that allows users to search for and nominate 5 movies, as well as allowing users to see the total amount of votes for the 5 most popular movies. Made for the Shopify intern application challenge

projects.name: Array Sorting Visualizer
projects.description: React.js application that generates an array and visualizes the array by using bars of different heights. It then visualizes how the merge sorting algorithm works.

projects.name: Lights Out Game
projects.description: Based on the 1995 game by Tiger Electronics, the user must turn off all lights on the board by clicking them, but this will also change the lights next to it. This application is made using React.js.

projects.name: Node.js Recipe App
projects.description: A Node.js and Express.js web app that allows a user to search through a recipe API from themealdb.com, archive certain recipes they like and have the list of ingredients emailed to the for convenience when shopping.

projects.name: React Colors App
projects.description: A responsive React.js Application built using React-routes that imitates other popular color websites. Allows users to copy color values from a series of pre-built palettes, users can also make new palettes that will save to the window local storage.

projects.name: Co-op Web App
projects.description: A React.js and Firebase.io application I made for myself that allows a user to login using their google account and enter records into a database pertaining to job applications. Uses authentication, and Firebase.io's firestore so a user can view the records only they have entered from any device.

projects.name: React Weather App
projects.description: A React.js application to retrieve weather information from a REST API and display data to the user using React state, background changes depending on the tempeture

projects.name: Crypo Currency Dashboard
projects.description: A React.js Application using React Context that graphs the historic value of cryptocurrency to a user. It uses localStorage so that a user can come back at anytime and view the same coins they favourited

projects.name: IP-Tracker
projects.description: A React.js application that allows users to search for an IP address or domain address and see the physical location if it
